column4: Hi - I am using audacity in intrepid - in the config it shows three options for a playback device - none of them seems to be the right one/or is working.. recording is working ok - i can export and play the files with a different player .. but not withing audacity.. any tips please??
Audacity doesn't work for me...I gave up quite a while ago, had same issues
what do u use now - (to produce mp3's for instance...?)
in a way it is a bit of an achedemic question - cos the thing does make mp3's perfectly - just cant play them back.. heheh
